summary: This document is an email correspondence primarily involving Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller discussing the transfer of securities related to the Haze Trust and Southern Financial. It includes details about account numbers and the process for transferring securities to Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is coordinating the transfer of securities.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is involved in the securities transfer process and is providing information to Amanda Kirby regarding the positions to be transferred.

persons.name: Kevin Quinn
persons.context: Kevin Quinn is mentioned as having the account number and TIN necessary for the securities transfer.

persons.name: Seldon Clarke
persons.context: Seldon Clarke is included in the email correspondence regarding the securities transfer.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Harry Beller are collaborating on the securities transfer process.
Amanda Kirby relies on Kevin Quinn for account information related to the securities transfer.
Seldon Clarke is included in the email chain regarding the securities transfer, indicating a working relationship.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating the transfer of securities for the Haze Trust and Southern Financial.
The email discusses the transfer of securities to Deutsche Bank.
Harry Beller provides details about the positions to be transferred and the timeline for the transfer.
Kevin Quinn is mentioned as having the necessary account number and TIN for the transfer.
The document is classified for internal use only.
